name: BluePoint Energy
overview: BluePoint Energy is an energy management company that provides state-of-the-art, enabling technology, environmentally responsible Demand Response and Ultra-Clean Combined Heat and Power solutions to commercial and industrial energy users across the majority of public and private industry sectors, including hospitality, retail, healthcare, manufacturing, education and government. BluePoint Energy incorporates innovative and proprietary engineering solutions into their Demand Response Asset Aggregation Program (D-RAAPâ„¢) as well as their EnviroGenÂ® Energy Modules utilizing their GenViewâ„¢ control systems to enhance their line of Demand Response and Ultra-Clean Combined Heat and Power product and service offerings while complying and exceeding the most stringent emission requirements in the world. BluePointâ€™s robust, multi-layered, Internet and microprocessor-based GenViewâ„¢ control system, designed to integrate energy generating assets with building management control systems, is the cornerstone for all of their product offerings. BluePoint’s innovative enabling technological capabilities coupled with strategic partnerships and alliances provide BluePointâ€™s customers superior solutions to their Demand Response and Ultra-Clean Combined Heat and Power needs.

funding_rounds.source_description: BluePoint Energy Products, Inc. Closes $5.9 Million Finance Facility With Calim Private Equity, LLC; Receives Initial Funds for Sales Development.
